name: Dress Up Games - Fashion Diva
description:
Make everyone’s eyes sparkle as they watch beautiful girls grace the ramp! Dress the hottest models in exclusive looks. Create your own signature shows with gorgeous outfits, hairstyles, accessories, and makeup. Style interesting looks for exciting theme-based challenges, and impress everyone with your creative flair.

***Go crazy with exclusive clothing and pretty jewelry! Become a FASHION GURU!!! DOWNLOAD "Dress Up Games - Fashion Diva" for FREE from the App Store NOW!!***

Main Features:
1. Play in multiplayer mode - Compete 1 on 1 on Fashion Events!
2. Style your model - Models are waiting for you to style them!
3. Design your perfect look - Outrageously stylish clothes and accessories!
4. Create your ideal style - Trendy hairstyles & ultra-glam makeup!
5. Dress to impress - Make everyone astound when they see the unexpected dress style choices you covet!
6. Exciting themes and breathtaking challenges - Feel the real pressure and tension of a runway show!

***Be the glowing star of your own fashion show! Dress your model in a fabulous outfit and give her attractive makeup! DOWNLOAD "Dress Up Games - Fashion Diva" for FREE NOW!!***
